description: A monitoring dashboard for OPNFV long duration test

panels.content: You're using the monitoring suite developed by OPNFV Bottlenecks team for OPNFV long duration test. The monitoring suite consists of a monitoring dashboard - Grafana , a monitoring data source - Prometheus and several monitoring tools - Barometer, Cadvisor and Node. The monitoring suite is evolving along with OPNFV releases and enriched features will be included based on practical needs.

### OPNFV Long Duration Test
This is a collaborative initiative launched by OPNFV test working group (Testperf) for long duration stability test (soak test) in NFV realm.
Several testing projects in OPNFV has been involved, i.e.,
[Bottlenecks - system limit testing](https://wiki.opnfv.org/display/bottlenecks),
[Functest - functional testing](https://wiki.opnfv.org/display/functest),
[NFVbench -NFVI benchmark testing](https://wiki.opnfv.org/display/bottlenecks),
[Storperf - storage testing](https://wiki.opnfv.org/display/bottlenecks),
[VSperf - data path testing](https://wiki.opnfv.org/display/bottlenecks) and
[Yardstick - performance testing](https://wiki.opnfv.org/display/bottlenecks).
For more detail, please refer to the [OPNFV LDT WIKI](https://wiki.opnfv.org/display/testing/Long+Duration+Testing).

rows.title: Nodes Overview - CPU, Network, Storage, Container Count

targets.expr: node_load1{instance=~"$server:.*"} / count by(job, instance)(count by(job, instance, cpu)(node_cpu{instance=~"$server:.*"}))
count by(exported_instance, job)(collectd_load_0{exported_instance=~"host."}) / (count by(job, exported_instance)(count by(exported_instance, job, cpu)(collectd_cpu{exported_instance=~"host."})))
